name: Operation: Earthquake
description:
Operation: Earthquake is a short top down shooter made for the LÖVE Jam 2022.

This is my first ever project released using this wonderful framework.

I wasn't really inspired by the theme so I've implemented it somehow into the game scenario. My main objective was to create a small game that I will be able to finish and I think I succedeed !

This is not meant to be a full game, just a small challenge
